summary: Since his rise to power, Mathayus' kingdom has fallen. Now an assassin for hire, he must defend a kingdom from an evil tyrant and his ghost warriors for the chance to regain the power and glory he once knew.

Lee|John Winters
keywords: horse riding|shared universe|bound and gagged|cleave gag|woman wears a veil
title: El rey escorpión 3: Batalla por la redención
